family.name: Decoders
family.comment: The WatchMan is normally programmed in OPs mode

model.comment: 8 block detector plus 8 Line I/O Driver

label.text: JMRI 4.2.1 or later is required to use this definition.
The unit address may only be changed in OPs Mode.
A changed unit address will only activate after a power cycle.

display.tooltip: Not required if there is a command station attached
display.label: Master Mode

display.tooltip: Remembers state of layout during power down
Reports sensor and output states at GPON

label.text: Warning! Bad Hardware ID! (23 required) Read full sheet to update.
